A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is a great film. I was born in 1973 and have seen every Star Wars film in the theatre. I have been an enormous fan all my life\, however\, I also realize that this is simply a movie. I rate films on the experience I have while watching them. Did I experience emotion? Was I moved by the story? Etc. These are questions I ask. I do not impose some random plot I have concocted in my mind and then give a negative review if the director doesn’t happen to read my mind and fulfill my childhood hopes and dreams. This is a fun movie! Go see it and don’t base your life on fiction.
